Accept Velvet Valley Home Services Casino Contact Home Services Casino Contact Privacy Policy At Velvet Valley, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose and protect your information when you visit our website and use our services. 1. Information we collect We may collect information about you in several ways. The information we may collect on Website include: Personal data: personally identifiable information, such as your name, shipping address, email address and telephone number, and demographic information such as age, gender, hometown and interests, which you voluntarily give us when you register on the Site or when you choose to participate in various activities related to the Site. Derived Data: Information that our servers collect automatically when you access the Site, such as your IP address, your browser type, your operating system, your access times and the pages you viewed directly before and after accessing the Website. Financial data: financial information, such as data related to your shape payment method (e.g. valid credit card number, card brand, date of validity) which we may collect when you purchase, order, return, exchange or request information about our services on the Site. 2. Use of your information Having accurate information about you allows us to provide a smooth, efficient and personalized. Specifically, we may use information collected about you through the Site to: Create and manage your account. Process your transactions and send related information, including purchase confirmations and invoices. Provide customer support. Send technical notices, updates, security alerts, and administrative and security messages support. Respond to your comments, questions and requests and provide customer service. Monitor and analyze trends, usage and activities related to our Services. Personalize and improve the Services and provide advertising, content or features that match your user profiles or interests. 3. Disclosure of your information We may share information we collect about you in certain situations. Your information may be disclosed as follows: By law or to protect rights: If we believe that disclosure of information about you is necessary to respond to legal process, to investigate or remedy potential violations of our policies or to protect the rights, property and third-party security, we may share your information as permitted or required by any applicable law, rule or regulation. Third Party Service Providers: We may share your information with third parties who provide services to us or on our behalf, including payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, customer service, and marketing assistance. Business Transfers: We may share or transfer your information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing or acquiring all or part of our business to another company. 4. Security of your information We use administrative, technical and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. Although we have taken reasonable steps to protect information personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our best efforts, no measure of security is perfect or impenetrable and no method of data transmission can be guaranteed against any interception or other type of misuse. 5. Children Policy We do not knowingly solicit or market information to children under 13. If we learn that we have collected information from a child under 13 without verification of consent of parents, we will delete this information as quickly as possible. If you believe that we can have any information from or about a child under 13, please contact us via contact details provided below. 6. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect, for example, changes in our practices or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons. We will notify you about any changes by publishing the new Privacy Policy on our Website. We recommend that you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. 7. Contact us If you have questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please contact us velvetvalley@gmail.com Velvet Valley Home Services Contact Casino Privacy Policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer

Accept Velvet Valley Home Services Casino Contact Home Services Casino Contact About Us Welcome to Velvet Valley Hotel, where luxury meets tranquility in the heart of scenic landscapes. Nestled amidst lush greenery and breathtaking views, our hotel offers a sanctuary of comfort and sophistication. At Velvet Valley, we pride ourselves on providing exceptional service and luxurious accommodations. Our beautifully appointed rooms and suites are designed with your comfort in mind, featuring modern amenities and stylish decor. Immerse yourself in luxury with our elegantly appointed rooms and suites, each designed to offer the utmost comfort and style. Indulge in gourmet dining at our restaurants, unwind with a rejuvenating spa treatment, or simply relax by our pristine poolside. We are committed to sustainability and eco-friendly practices, ensuring that our operations have minimal impact on the environment. From energy-efficient systems to locally sourced ingredients, we strive to make a positive difference. Meet Our Team John Doe General Manager With over 20 years of experience in the hospitality industry, John leads our team with a commitment to excellence and a passion for guest satisfaction. Jane Smith Head Chef Jane brings a culinary flair to our kitchen, creating delicious and innovative dishes that delight our guests and make every meal a memorable experience. Our Services Luxurious Accommodations Experience unparalleled comfort in our elegantly appointed rooms and suites, each offering stunning views and modern amenities. World-Class Dining Indulge your palate with a diverse selection of international dishes crafted by our talented chefs in our gourmet restaurant. Relaxation & Wellness Rejuvenate your body and mind with a range of soothing treatments at our luxurious spa, complete with state-of-the-art facilities. Event Spaces Host memorable events and meetings in our versatile and stylish event spaces, supported by professional event planning services. Our Mission At Velvet Valley, our mission is to redefine luxury and hospitality. We strive to create unforgettable experiences for every guest who walks through our doors. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in every detail, from our meticulously designed rooms to our personalized service. We believe in sustainability and community engagement. That's why we source locally, support local artisans, and minimize our environmental footprint. By choosing Velvet Valley, you're not just choosing a place to stayâ€”you're supporting a vision of responsible tourism and sustainable development. Our mission extends beyond providing exceptional accommodation. We aim to be a cultural hub, hosting events that celebrate art, music, and local culture. Through these initiatives, we foster creativity and connection within our community. At the heart of our mission is our commitment to exceeding expectations. Whether you're here for business or leisure, we ensure a seamless and enriching experience. Velvet Valley is more than a hotel; it's a destination where every moment is crafted with care and passion. Join us on our journey to redefine hospitality and create lasting memories. Experience the essence of Velvet Valley, where luxury meets purpose, and every guest is cherished. Frequently Asked Questions Reservations All reservations are subject to availability and must be guaranteed with a valid credit card. We reserve the right to cancel or modify reservations where it appears that a customer has engaged in fraudulent or inappropriate activity or under other circumstances where it appears that the reservations contain or resulted from a mistake or error. Check-In and Check-Out Check-in time is from 3:00 PM and check-out time is until 11:00 AM. Early check-in or late check-out requests are subject to availability and may incur additional charges. Payment Policy Payment for accommodation and any additional services must be made in full at the time of check-out unless otherwise specified in your booking terms. Velvet Valley Hotel accepts cash, credit cards, and debit cards. Guest Responsibilities Guests are expected to respect the property and other guests. Any damage to the property or excessive cleaning required will be charged to the guest's credit card. The hotel reserves the right to refuse service to any guest for any reason. Velvet Valley Home Services Contact Casino Privacy Policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer
